name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipe:
1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the spaghetti until al dente, about 8–10 minutes. Reserve 1/2 cup of pasta water before draining.
2. While the pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a pan and sauté minced garlic until fragrant. Add pancetta/bacon and cook until crispy.
3. In a bowl, whisk together eggs and finely grated Parmesan until smooth.
4. Add drained spaghetti to the pan with pancetta. Toss well to coat.
5. Remove the pan from heat. Slowly pour the egg-cheese mixture into the pasta while stirring quickly to prevent scrambling.
6. Add reserved pasta water, a little at a time, until a creamy sauce forms.
7. Season with black pepper, garnish with extra Parmesan, and serve immediately.

name: Chicken Curry
recipe:
1. Heat oil in a deep pan. Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
2. Stir in ginger-garlic paste and cook for 1–2 minutes until the raw smell disappears.
3. Add pureed tomatoes and cook until the mixture thickens and oil starts to separate.
4. Mix in curry powder and cook for another 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
5. Add chicken pieces and season with salt. Cook until the chicken is lightly browned on all sides.
6. Pour in coconut milk, stir well, and simmer on low heat for 20–25 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
7. Adjust seasoning, garnish with fresh coriander, and serve hot with rice or naan.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipe:
1. Wash and cut broccoli into florets, slice carrot thinly, and chop bell pepper into strips.
2. Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan. Add minced garlic and grated ginger, sauté for 1 minute.
3. Add carrots first, cook for 2 minutes. Then add bell peppers and broccoli.
4. Stir-fry vegetables on high heat for 5–6 minutes until crisp-tender.
5. Add soy sauce, toss to coat evenly, and cook for another 1 minute.
6. Serve hot as a side dish or with steamed rice/noodles.

name: Biryani
recipe:
1. Wash and soak basmati rice for 30 minutes. Cook until 70% done, then drain.
2. Marinate chicken with yogurt, spices, and salt. Let rest for 20 minutes.
3. Heat oil in a pan, fry sliced onions until golden. Remove half for garnishing.
4. Add marinated chicken to the pan, cook until almost done.
5. In a large pot, layer chicken, rice, fried onions, and mint leaves alternately.
6. Cover tightly and cook on low flame for 20 minutes (dum cooking).
7. Serve hot with raita or salad.

name: Tacos
recipe:
1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onion until translucent.
2. Add ground beef and taco seasoning. Cook until beef is browned.
3. Warm tortillas in a dry pan or oven.
4. Assemble tacos by filling tortillas with beef, shredded lettuce, chopped tomatoes, and cheese.
5. Serve immediately with salsa or guacamole.

name: Samosa
recipe:
1. Boil potatoes and mash them. Mix with peas, cumin, and spices for filling.
2. Prepare dough with flour, oil, salt, and water. Rest for 20 minutes.
3. Divide dough into balls, roll into circles, and cut in half.
4. Shape each half into a cone, fill with potato-pea mixture, and seal edges.
5. Heat oil and deep-fry samosas until golden brown.
6. Serve hot with chutney.

name: Falafel
recipe:
1. Soak chickpeas overnight and drain.
2. Blend chickpeas with onion, garlic, parsley, and spices into a coarse paste.
3. Shape mixture into small balls or patties.
4. Heat oil and deep-fry falafels until golden brown.
5. Serve hot with hummus or in pita bread.

name: Spring Rolls
recipe:
1. Shred cabbage and carrot, stir-fry with soy sauce for 2 minutes.
2. Place filling in wrappers, roll tightly, and seal edges.
3. Heat oil in a pan, fry rolls until golden and crispy.
4. Drain on paper towels and serve hot with sweet chili sauce.

name: Shawarma
recipe:
1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, garlic, and spices for at least 1 hour.
2. Grill or pan-cook the chicken until cooked through.
3. Slice chicken into strips.
4. Warm pita bread and spread with tahini sauce.
5. Add chicken strips and vegetables (optional).
6. Roll up and serve hot.

name: Pancakes
recipe:
1. In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
2. In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla.
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients, mix until smooth.
4. Heat a non-stick pan and pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake.
5. Cook until bubbles form on top, flip, and cook until golden.
6. Serve hot with syrup, fruits, or nuts.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipe:
1. Heat a pan on medium heat.
2. Butter one side of each bread slice.
3. Place one slice, buttered side down, in the pan. Add cheese on top.
4. Cover with the other bread slice, buttered side up.
5. Grill until golden brown on both sides and cheese melts.
6. Serve hot with ketchup or soup.

name: Caesar Salad
recipe:
1. Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
2. In a large bowl, toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
3. Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Serve immediately as a starter or side dish.

name: Chocolate Brownies
recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 175°C (350°F). Grease a baking pan.
2. Melt butter and mix with sugar, eggs, and vanilla.
3. Stir in cocoa, flour, salt, and baking powder.
4. Pour batter into pan and spread evenly.
5. Bake for 20–25 minutes. Insert toothpick to check doneness.
6. Cool slightly, cut into squares, and serve.

name: Minestrone Soup
recipe:
1. Heat olive oil in a pot. Sauté chopped onion and garlic until fragrant.
2. Add diced carrot, zucchini, and green beans. Cook for 5 minutes.
3. Add tomatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil.
4. Add pasta and cook until tender.
5. Season with salt, pepper, and Italian herbs.
6. Serve hot with a drizzle of olive oil or grated Parmesan.

name: Margherita Pizza
recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 220°C (430°F).
2. Roll out pizza dough on a baking tray.
3. Spread tomato sauce evenly over dough.
4. Add slices of mozzarella and fresh basil leaves.
5. Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle a pinch of salt.
6. Bake for 12–15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese melts.
7. Slice and serve hot.

name: French Toast
recipe:
1. In a bowl, whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla.
2. Dip each bread slice into the mixture, coating both sides.
3. Heat butter in a pan and cook bread slices until golden brown on both sides.
4. Serve hot with maple syrup or honey.

name: Veggie Burger
recipe:
1. Cook veggie patty according to package instructions.
2. Toast burger buns lightly.
3. Assemble burger: bottom bun, lettuce, patty, cheese, tomato, onion, sauce, top bun.
4. Serve immediately with fries or salad.

name: Lemonade
recipe:
1. In a pitcher, mix lemon juice and sugar until sugar dissolves.
2. Add water and stir well.
3. Serve chilled over ice cubes, garnish with mint leaves if desired.

name: Guacamole
recipe:
1. Mash avocados in a bowl.
2. Finely chop onion, tomato, and cilantro. Add to mashed avocado.
3. Squeeze lime juice and season with salt and chili.
4. Mix well and serve with tortilla chips or as a sandwich spread.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipe:
1. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water and drain.
2. Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté sliced garlic until golden.
3. Add chili flakes and stir briefly.
4. Toss in drained spaghetti and mix well, adding reserved pasta water if needed.
5. Garnish with chopped parsley and Parmesan.
6. Serve hot.

name: Chicken Alfredo
recipe:
1. Cook fettuccine in salted water until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. Season chicken with salt and pepper, cook in a pan until golden and cooked through.
3. In the same pan, melt butter, sauté minced garlic.
4. Add heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
5. Stir in Parmesan until sauce thickens.
6. Add fettuccine and chicken to the sauce, toss to coat.
7. Serve immediately with extra Parmesan.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 200g minced meat (or vegetables for veg version)
recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F).
2. Cut tops of bell peppers and remove seeds.
3. Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil, add minced meat or veggies, cook until done.
4. Mix cooked rice and tomato sauce with filling.
5. Stuff bell peppers with mixture, top with cheese.
6. Place in baking dish, bake 25–30 minutes until peppers are tender and cheese melts.
7. Serve hot.

name: Pad Thai
recipe:
1. Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft.
2. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and protein until cooked.
3. Push aside, scramble eggs in the same pan.
4. Add noodles, fish sauce, soy sauce, and tamarind paste, toss well.
5. Add bean sprouts, mix gently.
6. Serve with crushed peanuts and lime wedges.

name: Egg Fried Rice
recipe:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic.
2. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 2–3 minutes.
3. Push veggies aside, scramble eggs in the pan.
4. Add cooked rice, soy sauce, and salt. Stir-fry for 5 minutes.
5. Garnish with chopped spring onions and serve hot.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
recipe:
1. Heat olive oil, sauté chopped onion and garlic.
2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
3. Pour in vegetable broth, simmer for 10 minutes.
4. Blend soup until smooth.
5. Return to heat, add cream, season with salt and pepper.
6. Garnish with fresh basil and serve hot.

name: Beef Tacos
recipe:
1. Sauté chopped onion in a pan until translucent.
2. Add ground beef and taco seasoning, cook until beef is browned.
3. Warm taco shells.
4. Fill shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and top with sour cream.
5. Serve immediately.

name: Veggie Quesadilla
recipe:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté vegetables until tender.
2. Place one tortilla in a pan, sprinkle half the cheese and cooked vegetables.
3. Cover with the second tortilla.
4. Cook on both sides until golden and cheese melts.
5. Slice into wedges and serve with salsa or sour cream.

name: Banana Smoothie
recipe:
1. Peel bananas and cut into pieces.
2. Blend bananas, milk, yogurt, honey, and ice until smooth.
3. Pour into glasses and serve chilled.

name: Caprese Salad
recipe:
1. Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
2. Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a plate.
3. Add basil leaves between slices.
4. Drizzle olive oil, season with salt and pepper.
5. Serve immediately.

name: Cinnamon Rolls
ingredients: Glaze: 1 cup powdered sugar, 2 tbsp milk
recipe:
1. Mix flour, sugar, salt, and yeast in a bowl.
2. Add warm milk, melted butter, and egg. Knead into a smooth dough.
3. Let dough rise for 1 hour until doubled in size.
4. Roll out dough, spread softened butter, sprinkle brown sugar and cinnamon.
5. Roll tightly, cut into 1-inch slices.
6. Place in a greased baking dish, bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20–25 minutes.
7. Mix glaze ingredients and drizzle over warm rolls before serving.

name: Mango Smoothie
recipe:
1. Place mango, yogurt, milk, honey, and ice in a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Pour into glasses and serve chilled.

name: Vegetable Soup
recipe:
1. Heat olive oil, sauté onion and garlic until fragrant.
2. Add chopped vegetables, cook for 5 minutes.
3. Pour in diced tomatoes and vegetable broth.
4. Simmer for 15–20 minutes until vegetables are tender.
5. Season with salt, pepper, and herbs.
6. Serve hot with bread or crackers.

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
recipe:
1. Heat olive oil and butter in a pan.
2. Sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
3. Add shrimp, season with salt and pepper. Cook 3–4 minutes until pink.
4. Drizzle with lemon juice and garnish with parsley.
5. Serve immediately with rice or pasta.

name: Greek Salad
recipe:
1. Chop cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion.
2. Combine in a bowl with olives and feta cheese.
3. Drizzle olive oil and lemon juice.
4. Season with salt and pepper.
5. Toss gently and serve immediately.

name: Teriyaki Chicken
recipe:
1. Mix soy sauce, honey, mirin, minced garlic, and ginger to make teriyaki sauce.
2. Cut chicken into strips and marinate for 15 minutes.
3. Heat oil in a pan, cook chicken until done.
4. Pour remaining sauce into the pan, cook 2–3 minutes until glossy.
5. Sprinkle sesame seeds and serve with rice or noodles.

name: Omelette
recipe:
1. Beat eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
2. Heat butter in a pan.
3. Pour egg mixture, cook on low heat.
4. Add vegetables and cheese on one side.
5. Fold omelette and cook 1–2 minutes.
6. Serve hot.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 175°C (350°F).
2. Mix flour, baking soda, and salt.
3. In another bowl, cream butter and sugars, add egg and vanilla.
4. Combine wet and dry ingredients, fold in chocolate chips.
5. Drop spoonfuls onto a baking tray.
6. Bake 10–12 minutes until golden.
7. Cool slightly and serve.

name: Avocado Toast
recipe:
1. Toast bread slices.
2. Mash avocado, mix with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
3. Spread avocado mixture on toast.
4. Sprinkle chili flakes if desired.
5. Serve immediately.

name: Pesto Pasta
recipe:
1. Cook pasta in salted water until al dente, drain.
2. Toss pasta with olive oil and pesto.
3. Season with salt and pepper.
4. Serve with grated Parmesan on top.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
recipe:
1. Heat oil in a wok, sauté garlic until fragrant.
2. Add beef strips, season with salt and pepper, cook until browned.
3. Add sliced bell pepper and onion, stir-fry for 3–4 minutes.
4. Add soy sauce and oyster sauce, toss well.
5. Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
recipe:
1. Slice grilled chicken.
2. Place lettuce, chicken, and Parmesan on a tortilla.
3. Drizzle Caesar dressing, season with salt and pepper.
4. Roll tightly and serve immediately.

name: Veggie Fried Noodles
recipe:
1. Cook noodles according to package instructions, drain.
2. Heat sesame oil in a pan, sauté garlic.
3. Add vegetables, cook 3–4 minutes.
4. Add noodles and soy sauce, stir-fry for 2–3 minutes.
5. Season with salt and pepper and serve hot.

name: Cheeseburger
recipe:
1. Season beef patty with salt and pepper, grill until cooked.
2. Toast buns lightly.
3. Assemble burger with lettuce, tomato, onion, patty, cheese, and sauce.
4. Serve immediately with fries or salad.

name: Shrimp Scampi
recipe:
1. Cook pasta until al dente, drain.
2. Heat olive oil and butter, sauté garlic.
3. Add shrimp, cook 3–4 minutes until pink.
4. Pour in white wine and lemon juice, simmer 2 minutes.
5. Toss in pasta, season with salt and pepper.
6. Garnish with parsley and serve hot.

name: Tuna Salad
recipe:
1. Drain tuna and place in a bowl.
2. Finely chop celery and onion, add to tuna.
3. Mix in mayonnaise, season with salt and pepper.
4. Serve on lettuce leaves or bread slices.

name: Fruit Salad
recipe:
1. Chop all fruits into bite-sized pieces.
2. Drizzle honey and lemon juice.
3. Toss gently and serve chilled.

name: Pasta Primavera
recipe:
1. Cook pasta until al dente, drain.
2. Heat olive oil, sauté garlic.
3. Add vegetables, cook until tender.
4. Toss pasta with vegetables, season with salt and pepper.
5. Serve hot with Parmesan cheese.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
recipe:
1. Blend milk, chocolate ice cream, and chocolate syrup until smooth.
2. Pour into glasses, top with whipped cream.
3. Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Fried Rice
recipe:
1. Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic until fragrant.
2. Add vegetables and cook 2–3 minutes.
3. Push veggies aside, scramble eggs in the pan.
4. Add cooked rice and chicken, mix well.
5. Pour soy sauce, season with salt and pepper.
6. Stir-fry for 3–4 minutes and serve hot.

name: Grilled Salmon
recipe:
1. Preheat grill or oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. Rub salmon with olive oil, minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
3. Place lemon slices on top.
4. Grill or bake for 10–12 minutes until cooked.
5. Garnish with fresh herbs and serve hot.

name: Lemon Garlic Pasta
recipe:
1. Cook pasta until al dente, drain.
2. Heat olive oil and butter, sauté garlic.
3. Add cooked pasta, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
4. Toss well, garnish with parsley.
5. Serve hot.

name: Mushroom Risotto
recipe:
1. Heat butter in a pan, sauté onion and garlic.
2. Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
3. Add rice, stir to coat with butter.
4. Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring constantly until rice is creamy and cooked.
5. Mix in Parmesan, season with salt and pepper.
6. Serve hot.

name: Caprese Sandwich
recipe:
1. Toast bread lightly.
2. Layer tomato, mozzarella, and basil on one slice.
3. Drizzle olive oil, season with salt and pepper.
4. Top with second slice of bread, serve immediately.

name: Banana Pancakes
recipe:
1. Mash banana, mix with milk and egg.
2. Combine flour, sugar, and baking powder.
3. Add wet ingredients to dry, mix until smooth.
4. Heat butter in pan, pour batter to form pancakes.
5. Cook both sides until golden.
6. Serve with maple syrup.

name: Spinach Smoothie
recipe:
1. Blend spinach, banana, yogurt, milk, honey, and ice until smooth.
2. Pour into glasses and serve chilled.

name: Coconut Rice
recipe:
1. Rinse rice and soak 20 minutes.
2. In a pot, combine rice, coconut milk, water, oil, and salt.
3. Cook on medium heat until rice is fluffy.
4. Garnish with grated coconut and serve.

name: Egg Salad Sandwich
recipe:
1. Chop boiled eggs and mix with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper.
2. Spread on bread slices.
3. Add lettuce, top with second slice of bread.
4. Serve immediately.

name: BBQ Chicken Wings
recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. Toss chicken wings with oil, salt, and pepper.
3. Arrange on baking tray, bake 25–30 minutes.
4. Brush BBQ sauce on wings, bake 5 more minutes.
5. Serve hot.

name: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
recipe:
1. Boil peeled potatoes until soft.
2. Mash with butter, milk, minced garlic, salt, and pepper.
3. Serve warm.

name: Veggie Omelette
recipe:
1. Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
2. Heat butter, pour egg mixture.
3. Add vegetables and cheese.
4. Cook until eggs are set, fold and serve hot.

name: Blueberry Muffins
recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
2. Mix flour, sugar, salt, and baking powder.
3. Combine oil, egg, and milk, add to dry ingredients.
4. Fold in blueberries.
5. Pour into muffin cups, bake 20–25 minutes.
6. Cool slightly and serve.

name: Grilled Vegetable Skewers
recipe:
1. Cut vegetables into chunks.
2. Toss with olive oil, salt, pepper, and herbs.
3. Thread onto skewers.
4. Grill 10–12 minutes, turning occasionally.
5. Serve hot as a side or main dish.

name: Spicy Shrimp Tacos
recipe:
1. Season shrimp with chili powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
2. Heat oil, cook shrimp 3–4 minutes until pink.
3. Warm tortillas.
4. Fill tortillas with shrimp, cabbage, and salsa.
5. Serve immediately.

name: Pesto Pasta
recipe:
1. Cook pasta until al dente, drain.
2. Toss pasta with pesto sauce and olive oil.
3. Season with salt and pepper.
4. Serve hot with Parmesan cheese.

name: Carrot Cake
recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 175°C (350°F).
2. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon.
3. Beat eggs and oil, add to dry ingredients.
4. Fold in grated carrots and walnuts.
5. Pour into greased pan, bake 30–35 minutes.
6. Cool, slice, and serve.
